name: AP_CLAIM_PROC_2
description:
This table summarizes data for AP Claims service lines, with each service line given one row.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMP_CMG
columns.description: The component or component group used to determine the patient portion on service line of the AP claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMP_CMG_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component index record

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CML_LN
columns.description: The line of the adjudication table that was used to determine the patient portion of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_NET
columns.description: The network status of the service line on the AP claim. This column can be joined to column IN_OUT_NET_C in table ZC_IN_OUT_NET in order to translate the category value to the corresponding name or abbreviation.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMT
columns.description: The benefit tier that was used to determine the patient portion of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMT_COMPON_TIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the tier record.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_RFL
columns.description: The referral attached to the AP claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMA
columns.description: The adjudication formula used to determine the patient portion of the service on the AP claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMA_ADJUD_FORMULA_NAME
columns.description: The name of the adjudication formula

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMK
columns.description: The benefit package used to determine the patient portion of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMK_BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM
columns.description: The name of the benefit package.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_EPP
columns.description: The benefit plan used to determine the patient portion of the service line on the AP claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COPAY_CAT
columns.description: The copay category used in adjudicating the service line of the AP claim.  This column will be deprecated in a future release and replaced by the Clarity column AP_CLAIM_PROC_2.PAT_PAY_COPAY_SERVICE_TYPE_ID.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_DEP_SPEC
columns.description: The department specialty of the AP claim.  This column will be deprecated in a future release and replaced by the Clarity column AP_CLAIM_PROC_2.PAT_PAY_SPECIALTY_DEP_C.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_PT_AMT
columns.description: The patient portion for the service line on the AP claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_SRC
columns.description: The source of the copay or coinsurance value for the service line on the AP claim. If equal to 1, the value comes from the benefit plan. If equal to a value other than 1, the value comes from a coverage-level override.  This column will be deprecated in a future release and replaced by the Clarity column AP_CLAIM_PROC_2.PAT_PAY_COPAY_AMT_SRC_C.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COPAY_FLAG
columns.description: Stores 1 if the copay was collected at check-in.  This column will be deprecated in a future release and replaced by the Clarity column AP_CLAIM_PROC_2.PAT_PAY_COPAY_COL_SRC_C.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_AUTH
columns.description: Indicates whether authorization is required for the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CFR
columns.description: The benefit referral classifier record that was used to determine the patient portion of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CFR_CLASSIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The title of the classifier record.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_RFL_LST
columns.description: The list of referrals associated with the service line on the AP Claim.  This column will be deprecated in a future release and replaced by the Clarity table AP_CLM_PX_PAT_PAY_RFL.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CML
columns.description: The adjudication table used to determine the patient portion of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CML_ADJ_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the adjudication table.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_LFTM_MAX_EX
columns.description: Stores 1 if the patient's lifetime maximum has been exceeded and null otherwise.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_QTY
columns.description: The service line quantity used to adjudicate the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_CMP
columns.description: The component or component group from the contract that was used to adjudicate the allowed amount of the service on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_CMP_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component index record

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_NCC
columns.description: The vendor contract record that was used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_NCC_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_NCC_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the vendor contract that was used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_NCC_LN
columns.description: The line of the vendor contract that was used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_EAP
columns.description: The procedure record used in determining the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_ERX
columns.description: The medication record used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_DRG
columns.description: The DRG record used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_DRG_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_CMC
columns.description: The whole claim component group used to determine the allowed amount of the service line on the AP Claim.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_CMC_LN
columns.description: The service line from the AP Claim that matched the whole claim component group.

columns.name: SECTION_340B_YN
columns.description: Stores Y or N that indicates whether or not the drug was dispensed under the Section 340B Program for NDCs.

columns.name: COB_AMOUNT
columns.description: The calculated Coordination of Benefits (COB) amount for the service line.

columns.name: MOB_AMOUNT
columns.description: The calculated Maintenance of Benefits (MOB) amount for the service line.

columns.name: SRC_TYPE_OF_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description: The data source for the type of service.

columns.name: CLM_BEN_BKT_DATE
columns.description: The date the claim was applied to a benefit bucket.

columns.name: PRS_CRWN_INLAY_CD_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the prosthesis, crown, or inlay code for the service.

columns.name: PRIOR_PLACEMENT_DT
columns.description: This stores the prior placement date (PPD) for a dental claim. The PPD is used for replacement procedures to note when the prosthesis being replaced was previously installed.

columns.name: APPLIANCE_PLACE_DT
columns.description: The date orthodontic appliances were placed.

columns.name: REPLACEMENT_DT
columns.description: Date when orthodontic appliance was replaced.

columns.name: AMBU_TXPORT_WT
columns.description: The weight of the patient during ambulance transport.

columns.name: AMBU_TXPORT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The ambulance transport reason code.
entries: Nearest Facility for Care of Symptoms, Complaints, or Both
For the Benefit of a Preferred Physician
For the Nearness of Family Members
For the Care of a Specialist or for Availability of Specialized Equipment

columns.name: AMBU_TXPORT_DIST
columns.description: The ambulance transport distance.

columns.name: AMBU_PAT_CNT
columns.description: The number of patients in the ambulance.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_CITY
columns.description: The city of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The state of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_CITY
columns.description: The city of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_STA_C_NAME
columns.description: The state of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the country associated with the ambulance pick-up location. Join this column to ZC_COUNTRY_2 to translate to the country name.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the county associated with the ambulance pick-up location. Join this column ZC_COUNTY_2 to translate to the county name.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the district associated with the ambulance pick-up location. Join this column to ZC_DISTRICT to translate to the district name.

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the house number associated with the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the country associated with the ambulance drop-off location. Join this column to ZC_COUNTRY_2 to translate to the country name.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the county associated with the ambulance drop-off location. Join this column to ZC_COUNTY_2 to translate to the county name.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the district associated with the ambulance drop-off location. Join this column to ZC_DISTRICT to translate to the district name.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the house number associated with the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: CLAIM_LN_DTL_SVC_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Represents a clinical classification of the billed service.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COPAY_SERVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The copay category used in adjudicating the service line.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COPAY_SERVICE_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_SPECIALTY_DEP_C
columns.description: The specialty of the department where the service was rendered.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COPAY_AMT_SRC_C
columns.description: The source of the copay amount as determined during adjudication.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COPAY_COL_SRC_C
columns.description: The location where the copay was collected as determined during adjudication.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_PROC_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: The service's place in the adjudication order.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COB_FROM_OTH_LINES_AMT
columns.description: The coordination of benefits (COB) amount for this service that was transferred from other services on the same claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_COB_TO_OTH_LINES_AMT
columns.description: The coordination of benefits (COB) amount for this service that was transferred to other services on the same claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_HRA_DEF_ID
columns.description: The ID of the Health Reimbursement Arrangement (HRA) plan used to adjudicate the claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_HRA_DEF_ID_HRA_DEF_NAME
columns.description: Record name.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_HRA_ACCUMULATE_BY_C
columns.description: The family type from the Health Reimbursement Arrangement (HRA) used when adjudicating the claim.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_ADJ_BEN_CHECK_TYPE_C
columns.description: The type of benefits check performed when calculating the patient portion.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CHECKED_FOR_AUTH_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether authorizations were checked during adjudication.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_MATCHED_CMG_LINE
columns.description: The line of the component group that was matched during adjudication if the service was matched to a component group.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_CMP_CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the component that was matched during adjudication if the service was matched to a component.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_BEN_PLAN_CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the benefit plan that was used during adjudication.
